content: In which TV series did Captain Jean-Luc Picard and his crew aboard the starship USS Enterprise-D live?

Captain Jean-Luc Picard and his crew aboard the starship USS Enterprise-D lived in the TV series "Star Trek: The Next Generation." The show aired from 1987 to 1994 and was set in the 24th century, continuing the adventures of Starfleet officers exploring the galaxy and encountering various alien species and moral dilemmas. Picard was played by actor Patrick Stewart, and the series introduced many popular characters such as Data, Deanna Troi, William Riker, and Wesley Crusher.
